Demon, Lesser Ooze

This creature appears as a humanoid-shaped swirling form of blackish ooze. Its head is crocodilian and its mouth is lined with sharpened teeth.



Lesser Ooze Demon

CR 3

XP 800
CE Medium outsider (chaotic, demon, evil, extraplanar)
Init +0; Senses darkvision 60 ft.; Perception +14
DEFENSE
AC 16, touch 10, flat-footed 16 (+6 natural)
hp 25 (3d10+9)
Fort +6, Ref +1, Will +3
DR 5/cold iron or good; Immune acid, critical hits, electricity, paralysis, polymorph, poison, sleep, stun; Resist cold 10, fire 10; SR 14
OFFENSE
Spd 30 ft.
Melee slam +6 (1d6+4 plus 1d4 acid plus grab) or
bite +6 (1d6+3 plus 1d4 acid), 2 claws +6 (1d4+3 plus 1d4 acid)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
Special Attacks acid
Spell-Like Abilities (CL 5th)
1/day—summon (level 3, 1d2 lesser ooze demons 35%)
STATISTICS
Str 16, Dex 10, Con 16, Int 10, Wis 10, Cha 10
Base Atk +3; CMB +6; CMD 16
Feats Blind-Fight, Power Attack
Skills Climb +9, Escape Artist +6, Intimidate +6, Perception +14, Stealth +6, Survival +6; Racial Modifiers +8 Perception
Languages Abyssal; telepathy 100 ft.
ECOLOGY
Environment any (Abyss)
Organization pair, gang (2-5), or mob (6-11)
Treasure none
SPECIAL ABILITIES
Acid (Ex) A lesser ooze demon's acid dissolves only flesh. Any melee hit deals acid damage.


Lesser ooze demons are soldiers in the abyssal army of the Faceless Lord and the servants in his abyssal lair. They are relatively weak demons and are often pushed around and controlled by superior demons.

Lesser ooze demons stand about 7 feet tall.

Lesser ooze demons charge into combat and pound their enemies with their fists, or bite with their sharp teeth. They rely on their acid to fell their foes and depend on their damage reduction and spell resistance to protect them from harm. Ooze demons usually flee if the battle goes poorly, though if under the command of a more powerful demon (such as a greater ooze demon leading a squad of lesser ooze demons into battle), they do not retreat and always fight to the death.
